writer.name: 格奥尔吉·申格利亚 Georgiy Shengeliya

director.name: 格奥尔吉·申格利亚 Georgiy Shengeliya

introduction: Professionals in the billiard business decide to donate a huge amount of money for a good cause. The funds raised should benefit the elderly pool players and mentors of the main characters. The children decide to create comfortable conditions for their teachers to live in a specialized estate with suitable service and delicious food. Teams from Smolensk, St. Petersburg and Moscow joined forces to make a voluntary contribution. However, this was not included in the plans of the greedy greedy businessman and criminal ace Savitsky. He captures all the savings of his associates, sending killers to the fundraisers. But the couriers survived and told what happened. Offenders decide to teach a traitor a lesson in the most ingenious way. To do this, a game round is organized with large bets, in which a virtuoso nicknamed Classic will take part. He will be accompanied by a bodyguard Yuri, who will play an important role in the unexpected outcome of the whole story. It is impossible to refuse a game, as this will automatically be considered a loss. From this moment, the battle begins, not for life, but for death, which can be won only with the help of sleight of hand and, possibly, a drop of fraud, which did not affect the initial charitable goals of the main characters.
